Posts.Content: sugarlandIDC wrote: I had implants (under the muscle) approximately 4 years ago...now diagnosed with IDC and DCIS and having bilateral mastectomy. Looking for what happens to implants during treatment and how it changes reconstruction. If at all. Thanks Dx 6/14/2012, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 8/3/2012 Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Implants Prior to Double Masectomy.....anyone? sugarlandIDC sugarlandIDC
